source.eece1349: ### This is the latest and greatest version of AutoViz called AutoViz_Holo. It makes Interactive plots and dashboards on the fly with your own dataset. Now you can do: 1. Data Walkthru's with your team or clients or customers using interactive plots 2. You can set up dashboards with your data for others to play with and derive their own insights There's so much more you can do with this new functionality that I am hoping you create your own ideas on how to use it.
source.4e4e2a5a: # Remember that the Charts are not Interactive in Kaggle Notebooks because someothing in their notebooks is preventing them to be interactive. So try it with your local machine or better yet on a Cloud server.
